entry.title: WYPALL* X70 - Heavy-Duty Wipers (12 x 76s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: KIMBERLY-CLARK
Type: Wiper
Price: 175.08

WypAll® X70 are heavy-duty cloths, with high-tech HydroKnit™ fast-absorbing material. When you’re running a business, it pays to use the very best supplies. If you’ve been using either laundered shop towels or textile shop rags, you can trust Wypall X70 reusable paper towels. WypAll X70 are heavy duty cloths, with high-tech HydroKnit fast-absorbing material. WypAll X70 premium industrial cloths are made of soft pulp fibers, bonded to a polypropylene base sheet for absorbency and tear resistance, making them suitable for removing dirt, oil, grime and solvents in a variety of industrial and manufacturing industries. Plus, they come conveniently and compactly packaged in a quarterfold format (an alternative to a box of rags) and are so sturdy that they can often be used more than once (once you’ve used them a few times, they’re disposable). They are designed to clean surfaces and tools, making them a must-have for the HVAC, automotive, manufacturing and industrial industries. . 1 case = 12 packages, 76 sheets per pack, 912 sheets per case . WypAll X70 are durable, absorbent cloths that stay strong for cleaning performance. Each industrial cloth measures 12.5" x 12" (unfolded) and cleans oil, dirt, grime and solvents; Comes quarterfolded for easy storage

  • Ideal for tools and surface cleaning in a heavy-maintenance area
  • Tackle those heavy-duty industrial jobs usually handled by cloth rags
  • With a single wipe remove oil, grime and solvents
  • Pound for pound absorbs more oil and water than rags
  • Long-lasting performance extends usage and reduces waste
 Type Heavy-Duty
Dimensions 12" x 14.4"
Colour White

entry.title: Pro Tuff-Job™ W610 - High Performance Wipers (10 x 126s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Industrial Wiper
Price: 149.50

  • Ideal replacements for rental shop towels or rags
  • Excellent durability, strength, absorbency and solvent resistance
  • Perfect for heavy-duty machine & part wiping, applying solvents or thinners, adhesive cleaning, cable lubricant removal, tool clean-ups and applying stains
  • The ideal choice for applications that require resistance to solvents and virtually lint free wiping - applying aircraft solvents, wiping down print presses or plates and solvents for furniture stains
  • Allow you to control costs through reusability, consistent case count, size and quality
  • The next wiper pops up into position as each wiper is dispensed, offering easy dispensing and quality performance
  • Accepted for use in Canadian food processing facilities
Type  Heavy-Duty
Colour White
Sheets/box 126
Boxes/case 10

entry.title: PVA- All-Purpose Microfibre Cloths (5-Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vileda
Type: Wiper
Price: 4.55

PVAmicro is an innovative all-purpose cloth made from microfibre fabric impregnated with PVA. The PVA treatment makes the cloths inner structure smooth, revealing superior cleaning performance. PVA is well-known in professional cleaning and is used for synthetic chamois, which is appreciated for streak free cleaning and absorbency.

  • Microfibres ensures perfect cleaning performance on almost all surfaces
  • Good water absorbency for streak-free wiping without after-drying
  • Holds 40 times less particle residue after rinsing, compared to ordinary knitted microfibre cloth. Non-woven microfibre cloth
Dimensions  15" x 14"
Colour(s) Red, Yellow, Green,Blue(Window)

entry.title: Industrial Paper Wiper - Handy-Box (180/cs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: TORK
Type: Wiper
Price: 28.20

Tork® Industrial Paper Wipers are multipurpose wipers that are ideal for janitorial and industrial wiping tasks and hand wiping. This folded wiper comes in our portable self-dispensing handy box, which protects the wipers and allows you to easily transport the wipers to the work site. Constructed with 4-ply material, these are excellent for absorbing large amounts of oil and water. Durable and strong for heavy-duty wiping tasks, while gentle to use on hands and face. Particularly good for cleaning glass - does not leave any lint or streaks on surfaces. This product contains 100% recycled fibers. ECOLOGO® Certified. Health Canada Certified.
  • High quality, provides optimum absorption of oil, grease and cutting fluids
  • 100% synthetic and virgin fibres

Colour Blue
Dimensions 12.8" x 16.5"
Ply 4
Qty/Case 180 sheets
Sold/priced per  Case

entry.title: Shop Max® Wipers (30 x 60s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: TORK
Type: Shop Towel
Price: 112.79

The Tork® Advanced ShopMax Wiper Roll Towels are strong enough to power through oil, grease, and solvents, yet versatile enough to be an ideal everyday solution for general cleanup and spills. Its thick, cloth-like construction is highly absorbent and low linting, making it an effective, convenient towel for shop, auto and home. These multipurpose disposable towels are an excellent replacement for cloth rags. Their durability and high-performance characteristics make them a perfect choice for a wide variety of uses, from detail work in professional shops and garages to cleaning tools in do-it-yourselfers' workshops and garages. This product contains 85% paper content (60% recycled, 40% postindustrial) and 15% synthetic emulsion.
  • Tough on grease, grime and dirt and versatile enough to be an ideal everyday solution for general cleanup and spills
  • Highly absorbent and low linting
  • Excellent replacement for cloth rags
Type All-Purpose
Width 11"
Colour White
Description Tork Advanced - Wipes
Ply 1
Sheets/roll 60
Sheets/case 30
